alert.note: Alert for Copiah; Simpson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 7:15AM CST until January 30 at 1:30AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Rockport affecting Copiah and Simpson Counties. Pearl River Near Monticello affecting Lawrence County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River near Rockport. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 30.0 feet, Water begins to back up into higher agricultural and pasture lands, mainly on the Simpson County side of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 AM CST Friday the stage was 28.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 28.3 feet this afternoon. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - - && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Pearl River Rockport 25.0 28.3 Fri 6 am CST 28.0 27.2 25.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 715 PM CST.
